TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public auto ansi beforefieldinit ToolBar/ToolBarButtonCollection extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.Collections.IList

summary.span: 封装一个 控件的集合，供 类使用。

span.span: Encapsulates a collection of controls for use by the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是从零开始的索引的集合使用类来保存所有分配给工具栏的控件。The is a zero-based indexed collection used by the class to hold all the controls assigned to the toolbar. 使用方法将添加各个按钮和方法将其删除。Use the method to add individual buttons and the method to delete them. 调用方法从集合中移除所有的按钮。Call the method to remove all the buttons from the collection. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建并初始化和三个控件。The following code example creates and initializes a and three controls. 工具栏按钮分配给工具栏和工具栏添加到窗体。The toolbar buttons are assigned to the toolbar and the toolbar is added to the form. 此代码需要已创建。This code requires that a has already been created. remarks.format: ## Remarks 你通常不创建和显式调用其构造函数。You do not typically create a and explicitly call its constructor. 通过引用属性控件，创建。By referencing the property of the control, a is created. 然后可以访问其属性和方法，并分配控件添加到集合。You can then gain access to its properties and methods, and assign controls to the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性存储的实际数目分配给集合的控件。The property holds the actual number of controls assigned to the collection. 它是常见的是使用作为上限的一个循环来循环访问集合的属性值。It is common to use the property value as the upper bounds of a loop to iterate through a collection. 集合的索引值是从零开始的索引，因此你必须从减去 1 循环变量否则为你将超过集合的上限和引发异常。The index value of a collection is a zero-based index, so you must subtract one from the looping variable otherwise you will exceed the upper bounds of the collection and throw an exception. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示的之前和之后调用方法。The following code example displays the of the before and after the method is called. 此代码需要至少有一个已创建。This code requires that a with at least one has been created. span.span: Removes a given button from the toolbar button collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法移除中指定的位置。The method removes the at the specified location in the . 如果你想要删除所有控件从该集合，使用方法。If you want to remove all controls from the collection, use the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例中删除最后一个上。The following code example removes the last on a . 要移除的工具栏按钮的索引值设置为等于属性减 1，因为集合是一个从零开始的索引。The index value of the toolbar button being removed is set equal to the property, minus one, since the collection is a zero-based index.
